name: In the night (Patchwork)
description:
This rpg is primarily a 3d-ish attempt of the old survival horror /humor games of the 90's. I added a few special features such as the characters shrinking if injured or stressed. This game is a beta-test for now but I'll fix the bugs over the course of time and have it presentable soon.

I would like to thank cutievirus for rpg maker mz 3d!

**Recent patch**

I fixed the issue with the game not starting,  I forgot to not encrypt the files, how silly of me!

**Recent Additions**

a possible chest full of points (₧) to buy higher level gear...?

optional super boss added
